title: David Bishop and the Legend of the Orb
description: David Bishop and the Legend of the Orb recounts the adventures of David Bishop - a teenage orphan who suddenly finds himself pulled into an enigmatic new world filled with magic and a mysterious prophecy that somehow revolves around him.As the world begins to crumble around him, David is forced into the heart of an age old conflict between the forces of Good and Evil, each side desperately needing the incredible powers granted to him by his newfound connection to the Orb of Power.Overwhelmed by the magnitude of the events unfolding around him, David seeks the help of unlikely allies in an effort to unravel the mystery of the prophecy surrounding him and save the very kingdom he so desperately wanted to escape.Embark on this journey with David and his friends to discover a new world filled with adventure, magic, friendship, and discovery, that will surely pull you in and leave you on the edge of your seat, begging for more.
author: T.C.   Crawford
